summary: A comic-book artist meets a woman on the NY streets, but after a quick flirtation, she suddenly collapses, and is picked-up by an old ambulance. He checks all the hospitals in the area, but the woman seems to have disappeared.
cast: Eric Roberts|James Earl Jones|Megan Gallagher|Red Buttons|Janine Turner|Eric Braeden|Richard Bright|James Dixon|Jill Gatsby|Martin Barter|Laurene Landon|Nick Chinlund|Matt Norklun|Rudy Jones|Stan Lee|Max|Deborah Hedwall|Susan Blommaert|Beatrice Winde|Jordan Derwin|Alexandra Jones|Michael O'Hare|Daniel Chapman|Chris Norris|J.C. Lee|Kathryn Schultz|Joe Cirillo|Joe Pentangelo|Edgard Mourino|Sherry Beall|Gene Canfield|Tim 'The Byrdman' Byrd|Kevin Dornan|Rony Clanton|Illana Diamant|Kenneth Simmons|Frank Pagnanella|Peter Sabiston|Thomas Marchitelli|Cynthia Costas|Gene Colan|Kevin Hagen|Donna Evans|Theresa Hayes|Paul Yeuell|Gary Clark|Janelle Webb|Joe Tom Collins|Larry Hama|Chris Nelson Norris|Jim Salicrup|Charlie Sara
title: La ambulancia
